moreBlocks.articles:
• Personal Injury Protection (PIP)
    It makes more sense to think about PIP insurance as health insurance, rather than automobile insurance. PIP is insurance that pays your medical bills like health insurance when you are hurt in an automobile accident.
  • Automobile Accident
    We can quickly analyze your insurance coverage and the insurance coverage of the person who caused the accident and let you know what your options are.
  • Medical Malpractice & Nursing Home Neglect
    Whether it’s in a hospital or a nursing home, we all have a right to expect the best from those we entrust with our care.
  • Product Liability
    If you are seriously injured by a product, it is worth looking at the design, the manufacture, the instructions and warning that came with the product to see if your injury could have been prevented.
  • Premises Liability
    Any place that is open to the public has a responsibility to maintain that establishment in a safe and clean condition. When an establishment fails to do so, they can be held responsible for injuries that occur as a result of their negligence.

  • Automobile Accident
    We can quickly analyze your insurance coverage and the insurance coverage of the person who caused the accident and let you know what your options are.
  • Medical Malpractice & Nursing Home Neglect
    Whether it’s in a hospital or a nursing home, we all have a right to expect the best from those we entrust with our care.
  • Product Liability
    If you are seriously injured by a product, it is worth looking at the design, the manufacture, the instructions and warning that came with the product to see if your injury could have been prevented.

description:
Since 2004, The Pendas Law Firm has been providing premier legal representation for disadvantaged people who have suffered injuries caused by another’s negligence, and who have struggled to recover. With offices in Tampa, Bradenton, Orlando, Daytona Beach, Jacksonville, Fort Myers, West Palm Beach, Fort Lauderdale and Miami, The Pendas Law Firm is accessible to all of Florida.

Our lawyers bring a wealth of collective experience to The Pendas Law Firm, and have helped past clients to legally recover hundreds of thousands of dollars as compensation for sustained injuries. We represent plaintiffs in cases involving: medical malpractice, personal injury, product liability, premises liability, nursing home and hospital negligence, motor vehicle accident claims and insurance liability issues.

We understand that our success as a law firm is directly impacted by the satisfaction of our clients, and we never take that for granted. When you entrust your personal injury or medical malpractice case to our team of trial lawyers, paralegals and support staff, we go above and beyond to ensure that your experience is nothing short of exceptional. We do this by keeping you informed and protecting your interests at every stage of the legal process.

If you or someone in your family has suffered an injury by no fault of his or her own, and if you are feeling overwhelmed and unsure of how to recover from your losses and return to a stable way of life, please contact our Tampa law office. Our attorneys speak English and Spanish fluently and can help in any medical malpractice and personal injury-related legal matters. Call The Pendas Law Firm for a free legal consultation.
